bio: This Yo-kai is one lucky snake! He's really scared of being seen by humans, which happens a lot since he's terrible at hiding.

soultimate.name: Noko Smile
soultimate.description: Allies recover a lot of HP.

skill.effect: 12% Spd and 30% MM Spd boost when below 25% HP.
skill.name: Fight or Flight

name: Noko
